General.Name: Soosan Industries Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Soosan Industries Co., Ltd. provides power plant construction and maintenance services in South Korea. The company offers nuclear and thermal power plant construction maintenance services; and routine, preventive, predictive, and corrective maintenance, as well as planned outage and commissioning services. It also provides electric work services. The company was formerly known as Sukwon Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Soosan Industries Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Soosan Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Hyundai Venture Bill 307ho, Seoul, South Korea, 06349
